name: Music_4090.wav
keywords: ['heavy metal song', 'shrieking voice', 'male voice', 'angry voice', 'distortion guitars', 'aggressive percussion', 'bass', 'fast tempo']
caption: This heavy metal song features a male voice singing the main melody. This voice sings in an angry tone. The voice is shrieking. This is accompanied by percussion playing an aggressive rock beat. The distortion guitar plays a riff which starts off on the root note and then plays higher notes in the scale descending back to the root note. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. The mood of this song is anger. This song can be played in an action sequence in a movie.
